backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining access control, user profiles, journal entries, squads, reports, daily readiness inputs, and gamification logic with stateful maps and helper functions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to related frontend files, components, and test identifiers for Sleep Performance and other app features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend files describing routing, UI components, content modules, and offline‑first behavior.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS base defining OKLCH design tokens, dark mode variables, and shared utility styles for app theming.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point containing root mount node, favicon, metadata, and module script loader.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router configuration defining routes for core features and the full Sleep Performance flow within the AppShell layout.
frontend/src/components/assessments/Asse: Interactive assessment questionnaire component with progress tracking, navigation controls, and answer validation.
frontend/src/components/assessments/Outc: Displays assessment outcomes using cards and alerts, including text insights and interactive scenario choices with state-tracked selections.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/CoachA: Generates and displays prioritized daily coaching actions based on logged scores and streak, with dynamic icons and badges.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/DailyL: Provides sliders for logging daily readiness factors and submits them via a controlled form with loading and offline states.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Gamifi: Shows streaks, readiness tier, and earned achievement badges based on overall score and consistency.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Readin: Presents overall readiness score, factor breakdowns, and optional analysis with tier-based coloring and streak display.
frontend/src/components/fieldMode/FieldM: Toggles Field Mode using a switch bound to a custom hook with visual state indication.
frontend/src/components/journal/JournalE: Local journal entry editor supporting create, update, and delete with validation, persistence hooks, and toast feedback.
Main application shell providing navigation, mobile menu, profile actions, field mode toggle, and reset-data dialog.
frontend/src/components/missions/Mission: Renders a mission card with briefing, rewards, win conditions, completion state, and detailed unlock-rule checks including assessment requirements.
Displays mission results including pass/fail, score, XP, side quests, win‑condition breakdown, and optional reflection actions.
Runs mission steps, handles choices, scoring, timed steps, side quests, and produces the final MissionResult.
frontend/src/components/missions/Operato: Shows operator XP, rank progression, and recently unlocked items with tactical‑style formatting.
frontend/src/components/onboarding/Onboa: Guides new users through display name, disclaimers, and optional questions before saving profile info locally.
frontend/src/components/reports/ReportDi: Modal dialog for submitting abuse reports with reason selection, optional details, and async mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/system/AppStartu: Full-screen error state component showing a startup failure message with an optional retry button.
frontend/src/components/system/InitWarni: Banner displaying a non-null initialization warning using a styled alert component.
Defines detailed outcome content for assessment results, including explanations, relevance, and interactive insight cards.
frontend/src/content/assessments.ts: Provides assessment definitions with questions, scoring keys, and metadata for multiple personality and resilience models.
Developer documentation explaining assessment flow, structure, scoring logic, and how to extend assessments.
frontend/src/content/disclaimer.ts: Exports the application's disclaimer text clarifying its unofficial status and OPSEC responsibilities.
frontend/src/content/leaderGuidance.ts: Contains leader guidance content mapping assessment outcomes to team roles, communication styles, friction points, and coaching strategies.
frontend/src/content/modules.ts: Defines mission content including scenarios, decisions, timed steps, side quests, and reflection prompts in a structured Mission array.
frontend/src/content/sleepPerformanceCop: Provides all text strings for the sleep performance dashboard, including microcopy, mode descriptions, and educational tiles.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on the user’s Internet Identity, reinitializing and invalidating queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAssessments.ts: Handles local assessment storage, retrieval, trends, and unlock checks using localStorage keyed by device UUID.
frontend/src/hooks/useDashboard.ts: Computes and provides readiness data and handles saving daily inputs, scoring logic, and streak updates locally.
frontend/src/hooks/useFieldMode.ts: Stores and toggles a boolean field‑mode flag in localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication state and actions via Internet Identity, loading stored identities and managing login/logout behavior.
frontend/src/hooks/useLocalData.ts: Provides React hooks for local journals, daily inputs, and readiness state scoped to the local profile.
frontend/src/hooks/useLocalProfile.ts: Manages the device-scoped local profile with update, reset, and onboarding state helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useMissionProgression: Tracks mission progression, XP, ranks, unlockables, and mission history stored per device.
frontend/src/hooks/useOnlineStatus.ts: Exposes a boolean reactive online/offline status using browser events.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for optional backend operations with local-first fallbacks.
frontend/src/hooks/useSafeActor.ts: Initializes and manages a safe backend actor tied to Internet Identity with automatic query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useSleepPerformance.t: Handles sleep and caffeine logs, computes sleep performance metrics, and updates related local state.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining light/dark themes and field-mode UI adjustments.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point setting up React Query, Internet Identity, and rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/AdminReports.tsx: Displays a list of abuse reports, shows backend availability state, and allows admins to update report statuses.
frontend/src/pages/AssessmentHistory.tsx: Shows past assessment results and trend data using local storage, organized by tabs for each assessment type.
Provides leader-focused guidance based on the latest assessment results stored locally, including team roles and recommendations.
frontend/src/pages/AssessmentResults.tsx: Renders a completed assessment’s outcome, scores, reward info, and briefing content with navigation to history and trends.
frontend/src/pages/AssessmentRun.tsx: Runs an assessment questionnaire, scores the responses, saves the result, applies rewards, and navigates to the results page.
frontend/src/pages/Assessments.tsx: Entry page for the assessments module showing available assessments, completion status, and quick navigation to history and leader views.
frontend/src/pages/DailyDashboard.tsx: Dashboard page showing readiness status, quick logging, and sync/offline indicators using various hooks and cards.
frontend/src/pages/Groups.tsx: Groups management page allowing users to view, create, and join squads with dialogs and backend interactions.
frontend/src/pages/GroupSharedEntries.ts: Displays shared squad entries, group details, and member list with actions like copying invite codes, rotating codes, and leaving the group.
frontend/src/pages/Guidelines.tsx: Fetches and displays community guidelines in a simple card layout with loading handling.
frontend/src/pages/Journal.tsx: Local-only journal interface for creating, editing, and viewing private entries with optional prefilled content.
frontend/src/pages/MissionRun.tsx: Runs a mission by ID, handling progression, completion, debrief, retries, and optional journal reflection prompts.
frontend/src/pages/Modules.tsx: Renders mission categories, mission cards, and operator progress with tab-based filtering and navigation to mission details.
frontend/src/pages/PublicLanding.tsx: Empty page placeholder with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsAbout.tsx: Displays and edits local profile info, device ID, creation date, and disclaimer status using form controls and cards.
frontend/src/pages/SleepPerformanceActio: Provides mode-based sleep guidance, caffeine logging, nap recommendations, and related tactical tools.
frontend/src/pages/SleepPerformanceAnaly: Shows sleep debt metrics and maps them to performance impacts such as reaction time and injury risk.
frontend/src/pages/SleepPerformanceCheck: Form for logging a sleep window with optional pain and stress inputs before saving and navigating to analysis.
frontend/src/pages/SleepPerformanceDashb: Dashboard showing sleep metrics, readiness indicators, mode selection, and quick summaries with navigation to log sleep.
frontend/src/pages/Squads.tsx: Empty file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/SquadSharedEntries.ts: Empty file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/types/assessments.ts: Defines TypeScript models for assessments, including questions, options, scoring, outcomes, and stored results.
frontend/src/types/legacy.ts: Contains legacy types for journaling, groups, and reports used for compatibility with unimplemented backend features.
frontend/src/types/missions.ts: Defines mission structures including steps, choices, win conditions, rewards, unlock rules, and progression logic.
frontend/src/utils/assessmentScoring.ts: Provides scoring functions for dimensional, type-based, and banded assessments, generating deterministic outcomes.
frontend/src/utils/backendError.ts: Maps backend error messages to user-friendly guidance with offline-first handling and generic fallbacks.
frontend/src/utils/inviteCode.ts: Trims whitespace from invite codes before backend validation.
frontend/src/utils/localDataStore.ts: Implements localStorage-backed persistence for journals, readiness inputs, missions, assessments, sleep logs, and caffeine logs.
frontend/src/utils/localProfileStorage.t: Manages device-scoped profile data with UUID generation, loading, saving, and resetting logic.
frontend/src/utils/sleepPerformance.ts: Calculates sleep debt, readiness, risk metrics, caffeine effects, and provides sleep-related guidance utilities.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions to read URL params (including hash-based), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them from the URL hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state file describing the app’s offline-first React SPA design, current scope, and a list of implemented features with metadata.
